title: How do I set a custom audio file as the ringtone or notification tone?
answer:
For the CHM-U01/CHC-U01/CHC-U23 (support for dual SIM cards): 

 Go to Files. Touch and hold an audio file and touch Set as > Card 1 phone ringtone, Card 2 phone ringtone, or Notification ringtone. 

 For the CHC-U03 (support for single SIM card): 

 [Go to Files. Touch and hold an audio file and touch Set as > Phone ringtone or Notification ringtone.]()
